name: Dice Driven Dungeon
description:
WASD for movement and menuing

Return to confirm selections Backspace to cancel/go back

Created for GMTK 2022 Game Jam - Roll of the Dice Theme.  

The game is a throw back to older CGA DOS games with a twist of modern jRPG and D&D.  The game is meant to be played in a single sitting.  There are 20 randomized floors of the dungeon with the goal of reaching the Dark Lord on floor 21 in order to defeat him.

This game will break you.  You have been warned.

Every play through is rolled by the dice:

  • your amount of characters
  • your character stats
  • your damage
  • your items
  • encounters
  • steps allowed
  • etc etc etc

Controls:

  • WASD for movement and menuing
  • Return/Enter for confirming a selection
  • Backspace to exit/go back from a selection

Share your game finishing screenshots(please, no cheating or image editing) once the game is fully playable.
